summary: Lawyer Stephen Blume, specialized in divorces, lives a paradoxical situation when, having his own marriage break up, is still in love with his ex-wife.
cast: George Segal|Susan Anspach|Kris Kristofferson|Marsha Mason|Shelley Winters|Donald F. Muhich|Paul Mazursky|Erin O'Reilly|Annazette Chase|Shelley Morrison|Mary Jackson|Ed Peck|Jo Morrow|Gigi Ballista|Ian Linhart|Mario Demo|Erica von Kessler|Dennis Kort|Judyann Elder|Carol Worthington|Louis Gottlieb|Ray Schmidt|Virginia Denison|Warren Stagg|George Reynolds|Carol O'Leary|Karl Lukas|Phil Adams|Rutanya Alda|Chela Bacigalupo|Elizabeth Claman|Edward Coch Jr.|Barbara Duskin|Tamara Elliot|Leon Frederick|David Garfield|Lars Hensen|Jenny Hill|Harry Hollins|Jane Jenkins|Sally Kirkland|Hal Marshall|Marsia Masset|Daniel Nunez|Bonita Parsons|Corinne Patten|Andre Philippe|Albert Popwell|Philip Roth|Mark Russell|Adriana Shaw|Brenda Smiley|Lenore Woodward
title: Blume enamorado
